title: Offbeat Love Stories and More
description: A collection of humorous and unique short stories by noted fiction and nonfiction author Jennifer K. Lafferty. The majority of the stories center on love and romance. The pieces are an eclectic mix, ranging from historic farce, such as "Make Believe", to contemporary comedy/dramas like "A New Verse", and "It Happened at the Mall". Other genres are represented by such stories as the suspense filled "A Familiar Place", and the lighthearted coming of age tale "The Prom Date". The characters are colorful, witty and multi-dimensional. The writing style is original and imaginative. Selections include: A New Verse, Periwinkle 26, Choices, Make Believe, It Happened at the Mall, A Familiar Place, Eye on the Prize, Overseas Adoption, Chance Meeting, Riddles and Jingles, The Surprise, The Prom Date, The Anniversary Gift, Unlikely Friends.
author: Jennifer K. Lafferty
